    Reference

    All functions

    export2genx()

    Export XRD data to GenX format

    xrd.find.Peak()

    Finds Peak Position from Gaussian

    xrd.get.AllPeaks()

    Finds all the peaks in a spectrum

    xrd.get.DebyeScherrer()

    Applies Scherrer Equation to PeakStats

    xrd.get.PeakProminence()

    Returns the Peak Prominence

    xrd.get.PeakStats()

    Fits a Gaussian Function to XRD data

    xrd.getSampleFiles()

    Returns XRD sample files

    xrd.getSamplePath()

    Return sample path for XRD data files

    xrd.import()

    Imports Rigaku XRD Data File

    xrd.peakEstimate()

    Estimate Highest Peak in Selected Data Set

    xrd.read.ASC()

    Reads the ASC Rigaku XRD file with a Header

    xrd.read.RAS()

    Reads the RAS Rigaku XRD data

    xrd.read.RASX()

    Reads the RASX Rigaku XRD data

    xrd.read.TXT()

    Reads the TXT Rigaku XRD file with a Header

    xrd.read.TXTnoheader()

    Reads the TXT Rigaku XRD file with no header

    xrd.readHeader.ASC()

    Reads the header of an XRD ASC file
